name: Party Crashers: Balloons (DEMO)
description:
"Pick up", "Throw" to have a good time with your friends! Party Crashers: Balloons is a casual party VR game.

Game Mode:

-Scruffle Mode: Pick up items on the ground, throw at your opponent, and win!

-Handball Mode: Team up with your teammates to pass, shoot, and score! Smash your opponents and hinder their attacks!

-Graffiti Mode: Use props with different functions to turn the surrounding walls into your color!

Come and join us, make new friends in the party hall, and experience some fun mini-games together！
